SqlDefinition.SqlCommand:
SELECT `ID`,`Version`,`Update_Status`,`Target_Url`,`AppType`,`AppKey`,DATE_FORMAT(`VersionDate`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS VersionDate,`FileSize`,`CreationUser`, DATE_FORMAT(`CreationDate`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CreationDate ,`UpdateContent` FROM `TB_MB_AppVersion` where STATUS=false ORDER BY `ID` DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>;
SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM `TB_MB_AppVersion` where STATUS=true;
UPDATE TB_MB_AppVersion SET STATUS=true WHERE ID=@@ID@@
